description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Radiant, Weapon

Standard, At-Will

+26 vs AC; 2d8+13 damage (crit 22 + 3d8 + 5d10 radiant). Miss: 7 damage. Drizzt can change Twinkle's damage type to radiant as a free action.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Cold, Weapon

Standard, At-Will

+26 vs AC; 2d8+13 damage (crit 22 + 3d8 + 5d6 cold). Miss: 7 damage. Drizzt can change Icingdeath's damage type to cold as a free action.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Force, Weapon

Standard

Ranged 20/40

Targets two enemies; +24 vs Reflex; 2d10+9 force damage (crit 29 + 5d6 force damage, and the target is knocked prone).

hit.critFormula: 29 + 5d6 force damage, and the target is knocked prone

description.value:
At-Will ✦ Weapon

Standard

Drizzt makes three melee basic attacks (no more than two can be made with the same weapon), and he shifts 1 square before the first attack and after each attack. After the attacks are made, Guenhwyvar shifts 1 square, and then makes a melee attack as a free action

At-Will ✦ Weapon

Immediate Interrupt

Trigger: When an enemy hits drizzt with a melee attack, at-will

Drizzt makes a melee basic attack that deals half damage on a hit, but on a hit, the target is also weakened and grants combat advantage until the start of its next turn.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Weapon

Standard

Drizzt makes up to five melee basic attacks, no more than two attacks on the same target. On each hit, the target is pushed 3 squares and knocked prone, and then Drizzt shifts 3 squares

Encounter

Minor, Encounter

Ranged 10

+24 vs Reflex; until the end of Drizzt's next turn, the target grants combat advantage to all attackers, and the target cannot benefit from invisibility or concealment.

Encounter ✦ Zone

Minor, Encounter

Close burst 1

This power creates a zone of darkness that remains in place until the end of Drizzt's next turn. The zone blocks line of sight for all creatures except Drizzt. Any creature entirely within the area, except for Drizzt and Guenhwyvar, is blinded

At-Will

Minor

Drizzt designates his closest enemy as his quarry until the end of the encounter or until he designates another quarry. Once per round, on a hit, Drizzt can deal 3d8 extra damage to his quarry.
Enemies adjacent to Drizzt do not benefit from concealment, total concealment, or invisibility.
When Drizzt shifts, he can shift 3 squares instead of 1 square and he ignores difficult terrain.

system.biography:
HP 764; Bloodied 382Init +19 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 35Fort 34Ref 35Will 32
Speed 7 see also undisturbed stride
Ability ScoresStr 22 (+16)
Con 15 (+12)		Dex 24 (+17)
Int 15 (+12)		Wis 17 (+13)
Cha 13 (+11)
Languages Common, Dwarven, Elven, Goblin
Alignment Good
Skills Acrobatics +22, Dungeoneering +18, Nature +18, Stealth +28Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 23 | Insight 23
